story.title: The Hero Game
story.storyDescription: Richard: Where are you, Jules??? You shouldn’t leave the campsite on your own.

messages.text: Where are you, Jules??? You shouldn’t leave the campsite on your own.
Christ. I think I just heard a scream outside. I’m gonna go outside and check.
You almost had me, lol.
A trail of blood?? #bitmuch
It’s pretty authentic tho. Where does it lead?
Follow the path and find out. :)
K - I’m following, but you know I like to get a full eight hours of sleep.
Wait - WTF. JULIA???????????
Took you long enough. I’m not Julia, but I really do enjoy using her fancy smartphone.
THAT WAS OUR DOG, YOU MONSTER!
It was *her* dog. You never really liked dogs.
Wendy didn’t deserve to be nailed to a tree like a goddamn Christmas ornament.
I wanted you to know I was serious before we started the game.
What game? Where’s Julia? Is she safe?
Relatively.
I’m a high-school teacher.
I don’t have much money, but I’ll give you whatever I have.
Money? Don’t insult me.
Then what?
I want you to be happy.
I am happy. We’re happy. Just give Julia back.
No, you aren’t.
She has chopped your balls off.
She has made you into an insignificant man.
That’s why we’re going to play a game. So you can be a hero.
Richard, did I mention there is no cheating in this game? :)
Did you hear her scream? I hope you heard it. It’s delightful.
JULES! Don’t hurt her.
I don’t want to, but you called the cops and that’s cheating.
How do you know that?
Perhaps I should have mentioned that I’ve cloned your cell-phone so I can track your movements and listen to your calls.
I’ll call the police and tell them it was a mistake. Just don’t hurt her.
Good. Are you ready to play?
If I “play”, then you won’t hurt her?
Yes, don’t you trust me? ;)
What do I have to do?
Become a hero by completing three quests.
First quest:  Dive into your fear from whence you could not rise.
The riddle is about me?
It’s such a rush feeling her body quiver at the edge of my blade. You better hurry because I get bored easily.
"Dive into your fear"? Oh shit. I’m afraid of the water.
So I need to dive into somewhere?
“So yesterday, I’m standing there naked by the lake and I’m waiting for him to take me, but he can’t get it up. Completely humiliating. He hates me, but won’t admit it. I know it.”
Julia sent that text to her backburner bitch, Ben, last night. So thirsty.
I’m running to the lake now.
“Ridic. Lol is he gay or something??” - Ben's response.
You’re not going to break me.
She’s right about you hating her. Isn’t she?
I found the fins on the beach. I’m putting them on.
I can see you trembling in front of the water.
I can’t do this.
Either you dive in or I stop making “cosmetic” cuts and start making permanent ones.
I will drown.
What did she do after you couldn’t get it up, Dick?
She swam out into the lake.
Because she knew you were too big a coward to go out and bring her back.
You’re going to let her die because you’re too afraid to face your fear?
I’m diving.
Good. I’ll be watching.
Holy shit. I did it. Swam to the bottom!
I knew you could. You just needed encouragement.
But, why did you leave a knife? What am I supposed to do with it?
You’ll know what to do with it when the time comes. ;)
Quest 2: “Can't you forgive me at least just temporarily, I know that this is my fault, I should have been more careful (come on)!”
What?!
You know...I’m starting to get bored.
Maybe I’ll trim off that gut that Julia’s always bitching about.
I can’t think. I’m literally shaking.
I just let Julia read that pathetic text.
I am pathetic. I do everything for her and she’s never satisfied. You’re right.
Then why do you stay with her?
She’s bi-polar, you fucker. She can’t help it.
“He’s turned everyone against me so I’m dependent on him. Dickie loves being the victim.”
That’s just the disorder talking. She knows I want to help her.
Time is running out. I hope you appreciate the nose job that I’m giving her.
It’s a song lyric! I’m Googling it.
Ariana Grande!
I bought her the CD as a joke.
I don’t know if I can stop now.
It’s in the car! I’m going! I’m GOING! JUST STOP!
Can’t stop, won’t stop. Who needs finger tips?
Stop. STOP! I’ll text you when I get back to camp.
I’m here.
I’m opening the CD.
Do you like the photos I took? I’m just an amateur, but I really like the mood I captured.
Did you show her these?
Don’t be mad, but I did. :)
Why are you doing this? Why?!!! THIS IS OUR LIFE!
Don’t blame me for your own actions. You chose to sleep with one of your students.
I didn’t tell her because of her sickness.
LIES! THAT’S ALL YOU DO IS LIE TO JULIA! TO YOURSELF! TO EVERYONE!
Tell me something truthful or I slice through Julia’s aorta and let her bleed out.
SHE MAKES ME FEEL INSIGNIFICANT, YOU’RE RIGHT!
But it’s because she is a million times smarter and more capable then me and I know the only reason she sticks around...
...is because I deal with her shit. If it weren’t for her disorder, she’d be gone.
Well done, Richard. Well done. Time for the final quest.
Quest 3: In the belly of the unwanted, you’ll find your defining choice.
Belly of the unwanted?
Wendy. You sick fuck.
You’re getting good at this.
I’m not far. I’ll text you when I get there.
I hope you still have that blade. ;)
I’m here. The birds have already pecked out the poor creature’s eyes.
Don’t make me do this.
You need to get your hands dirty.
I’m here. Isn’t that enough?
I made it easy. Look under its belly and follow the Xs home with your blade.
I’m cutting open the stitches.
Oh god, the smell is awful. I just vomited.
I thought we were done with the baby shit. Reach in and grab the message.
I don’t get it.
A phone number? Whose is it?
Principle Morris. You will tell him that you’re sleeping with one of your students or I kill Julia.
Your career or her.
I thought you wanted me to be a hero.
A hero sacrifices. Your admission was touching, but now you need to prove it.
There’s no other option is there?
You could let me kill her. She’s already lost a lot of blood and a lot of flesh.
There is another option.
What are you talking about?
I am holding her back. I am making her worse.
I’m the one that has to go, but she’ll never let me go.
Can you hear me scream, asshole?
No! DON’T!
What did you do? WHAT DID YOU DO!
I stuck myself with that pretty blade you gave me and now I’m dying.
NO! THAT WASN’T THE PLAN!
I’m going to die. You have to let her go. I win. I’m a hero.
I’m so sorry, Dickie.
Only Jules calls me, Dickie.
It was you?
I needed to know you loved me.
I always loved you, Jules. But now you’re free.
